reviewText: At first I was rather disappointed in the tape as it basically shows the guy giving the woman a massage on the bed and once in a while a Voice over would pop up and describe what was going on. However, as I watched carefully the techniques he used and began to imagine myself applying the same massage to my woman it really did become very helpful.  When I did the massage to my woman, I could remember the movements and the voice over reinforcing what I should focus on.  This is a solid instructional tape.  Camera angles could have been better but overall I was very happy with it.

This video was exactly what we needed to incorporate/motivate some quality time for ourselves as a couple! i disagree with the two star review, as this video gave ample ideas to shower attention where deserved! This video just set the pace and brought some passion into it!

You did a good job at showing how massaging can be done in the comfort and sanctity of your home - (in the DVD - pleasure your man)..... so I bought this one for HER.... and ME....  We're going to make sure our friends get a copy....Erotic, sensual, informative, easy to watch and follow.... and what makes it great is that it's a win win....

I bought this for my husband.  He had a difficult time understanding how massage is the best way to "warm me up".  This one did it!  Thank you.  Done tastefully - but to the point!  I love it.  I love you.  I love him!!!

ALL THIS MOVIES SENSUAL COUPLES MASSAGE NEVER BUY ! NEVER! It is the worst quality for Blu-ray, it is home made video an is like on VHS not blu-ray! Music terrible! Boring Boring Boring! It is even not sensual massage!!!! I return it!!! The worst ever!

If you know anything about massage (I'm licensed) you will see so many bad technique examples its disheartening. Adding to that the material covered is so basic and hardly sensual it doesn't provide any useful techniques even if demonstrated well. Its all watch and learn too, no real discussions on how to do strokes or why anything is being done. get a basic book or just watch a few you tube videos and you will learn everything here.
BTW: If you are looking for anything specifically sensual, I rate this a solid G for general audiences.

I give it 4 stars.

It's full of information but don't have the glitz of a TV infomercial which is fine with me.  I just like to get down to business and learn.

it sometimes use pretty technical terms but they do come back and explain everything.

I didn't get everything the first time I watched it but that's why I got the DVDs.  I'll be watching as a refresher from time to time.

Bought a few DVDs but should have looked for the combo set

I bout some of this company's DVDs, then rented the rest on video on demand.  Its good stuff just wish I would have fully reseatched thier products to find the combination sets they offered.  I'd recommend the DVDs for anyone wanting to learn about massage.
Don't waste your money on this even if you are a licensed massage therapist. It much too rudimentary to be helpful and only banally informative.
This is a basic massage video.  You watch the couple give a basic massage.  Nothing you wouldn't already know how to do in the first place.

Now this is one I'd suggest.  I've looked around and purchased several massage instructional videos with very mixed results.  Some were older looking, some lacked actual teaching and some were just gross.

This one is a pretty good balance of all.  It concentrated on instruction but didn't have any distracting features or filming.
this was no help at all. thought i could get some tips from this. well there were none!!! i did this well on my own!

I had previously oodered a couples massage video but I thought this video was a different video. To my disappointment this video had a different cover but the same vidio. Also the video I ordered months ago had two disk. One described how to massage a woman and the other described how to massage a man. This video only described how to massage a woman. I gave the disk to a friend. The video quality was very good and the massage given was on the gentel side of massages. I have only viewed the massage for woman.

If this Blu-ray sold for $1, I would still consider it a rip-off.  The video looks like a poor conversion from a VHS tape.  In no way is the original video hi-def quality.  After a brief introduction by the doctor, the video instruction begins with several minutes of a man making a bed and a woman folding clothes. They are trying to make the point that the man should help the woman with housework to help make her feel more comfortable.  The video spends an inordinate amount of time to make obvious points.
The quality of the "instruction" is also VERY poor.  There is sparse narration with no real instructional value.  Directions, such as "Begin by gently rubbing the top, bottom, and sides of the feet using both hands at once."  These is no description of real technique.  The video is shot from across the room, so it is difficult to learn any techniques from watching the action.  There are many other videos (DVD and Blu-ray) and all are a better value than this one. Don't waste your money.

I've had a few massages, and there was nothing in this video that was new for me. It was OK to reinforce some basic principles, but we had to put it on 60x speed to be able to make it to the end. This would be a good intro for somebody who has never received a professional massage.

Well i will start off by saying when i purhased this video i was in search of a massage video that tuaght on how to do sensual massages.  For instance I was looking for answers to things like how fast, what motions, do you use 1,2,3.. fingers? etc...  Instead here is what I recieved...
1) cover says its version 2.0 which has interactive Menus and advance DVD features - Definitely NOT - At BEST its a re-recording of a VHS tape with a voice over, no chapters therefore if you want to revisit any part of the video you will have to fast forward.
2) No techniques are tuaght, unless u call "massage the feet with your hands" a technique.  It does give you instruction on where to start first, but a 30second google search will give you that answer for FREE.
3) The massage type is NOT sensual, you are just watching someone perform a massage that is too fast to be considered sensual. Someone might want to explain to Dr. Heith Root what the meaning of sensual is...

bottom line is I am not a masseuse, but my research on the internet tuaght me more than the video.  Perhaps if you just arrived to earth having spent all your life in a space ship alone then the video would be a good start (just incase that does happen to someone is why I didn't give it the lowest possible rating) but other than that I truly wish I had not wasted my time.

This DVD made giving a massage a breeze!  The wife loved her massage so much, she actually fell asleep near the end of the massage.  This is really saying something, because she has a very hard time getting to sleep.

Now that I watched the video, everything I did via imitating the video seems so obvious.  It's worth the couple dollars.  Don't hesitate to buy it.

First of all, this shouldn't be offered on blu ray : it is VHS tape quality.
Secondly, it is way to expensive : buy the dvd instead and try to find it second hand; don't pay more than 10 and i'm being generous.
Thirdly,it's a cheap amateurkind production and most of all boring : this is massage for the shy.

Really bad. I am seriously suspicious of the "rave reviews." Whoever made this DVD has poor video skills, to put it mildly. The camera just drifts around and some of the time you can't even see what is happening. Very cheap production and it shows in every scene. You aren't going to learn much here.  I take massage seriously and this is insult to the serious student. Trust me, you aren't going to learn anything that will "turn on" a woman here,
This is an amateur look of ways to massage your woman. I didn't really learn anything from it but it may be great for others
I took at look at this video and really learned a lot.  I'm glad I did.  It's really full of good massage stuff.  This would be a good gift.

What a difference.  My boyfriend said he bought a tape for me, but I never knew what he meant. It was not for me, but for ME. Our experience was so different and so very complete.  He wanted me to rate him, so we watched the DVD together.  It was very well done.
Relationships get stale after awhile.  Mine did.  I bought this and it was a wonderful way to get the play back into our relationship.  Well thought out and programmed.  It was a relationship rescue.
works like the energizer bunny
Very bad video showing nothing
Its not a bad video,but it does not go into a whole lot of detail either as far as technique goes. It is more about how to get started in the profession of massage.
Lame. Nothing like a true complete tantric massage given by an Asian master. I've had lots of them around the world and NONE of them were remotely this lame.
Hopeless
Nice Movie
sell it back to you
my husband and I found this cd very helpful in correctly using the  massage process. Was found to be very informative
You have to know absolutely nothing about woman or massage to enjoy this ... Look like a cheap PJ13 porn for catholic, music and sound weird and totally off

looks like it was shot originally on a shoulder VHS recorder.  fast forwarding through the video, it appeared to offer no special technique or insight- the only thing approaching sensual is the lady lying on a bed with only a towel covering her (not the woman on the cover).  it should not be released on BRD (misleading), and the DVD should be less than $5.  I consider this purchase wasted money, as there was nothing to learn from this video and quality was far less than implied.
